subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: It was a good day for Americans besides the Williams sisters. On the men’s side, Denis Kudla defeated Santiago Giraldo of Colombia, while CoCo Vandeweghe continued her impressive run by beating Sam Stosur.
snippet: It was a good day for Americans besides the Williams sisters. On the men’s side, Denis Kudla defeated Santiago Giraldo of Colombia, while CoCo Vandeweghe continued her impressive run by beating Sam Stosur.
